title: 415. How Rahm Emanuel Would Run the World
description: As a former top adviser to presidents Clinton and Obama, he believes in the power of the federal government. But as former mayor of Chicago, he says that cities are where real problems get solved — especially in the era of Covid-19.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: As a former top adviser to presidents Clinton and Obama, he believes in the power of the federal government. But as former mayor of Chicago, he says that cities are where real problems get solved — especially in the era of Covid-19.
